SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.server.common

Interface VirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiServer, RmiServerProxy, Server, ServerProxy, SocketServer, SocketServerProxy
public interface VirtualServer extends Remote, Serializable
This interface represents a server instance, either a real server or its proxy

Be aware that all the match methods are handled at the match server level, so they are not defined here but in VirtualMatchServer

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(ServerCommand command) throws IOException
      Send a generic server command to be executed
      Parameters:
      command - a server command object to be sent to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • connect

      void connect(VirtualView client) throws IOException
      Server expects this method to be run to establish a new connection with a client
      Parameters:
      client - view to be added as a connected client
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname, String stub) throws IOException
      Override request for the autogenerated nickname (stub) with the user defined one
      Parameters:
      nickname - user defined nickname
      stub - autogenerated nickname
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • getMatches

      void getMatches(String nickname) throws IOException
      Request for the list of currently active matches
      Parameters:
      nickname - client sending the request
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • createMatch

      void createMatch(String playerNickname, Integer requiredNumPlayers) throws IOException
      Request for match to be created
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - client sending the request
      requiredNumPlayers - number of player of the new match
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • joinMatch

      void joinMatch(String playerNickname, Integer matchId) throws IOException
      Request to join a match
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - client sending the request
      matchId - id of the match to join
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted

    • ping

      void ping(String nickname) throws IOException
      Ping request / Response to a pong from a client
      Parameters:
      nickname - client sending the request
      Throws:
      IOException - if the communication is interrupted
